metadata.title: CVE-2022-1319 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Undertow. For an AJP 400 response, EAP 7 is improperly sending two response packets, and those packets have the reuse flag set even though JBoss EAP closes the connection. A failure occurs when the connection is reused after a 400 by CPING since it reads in the second SEND_HEADERS response packet instead of a CPONG.

criterions.comment: undertow package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
